text: By implementing the ERC20 token protocol and combining it with Nakamoto Proof of Work distribution in an Ethereum Smart Contract, 0xBTC is decentralized, permissionless, mined and scarce such that it is a transparent and permanent digital record of transferrable value. As credibly neutral verifiable currency, 0xBTC benefits from the speed, composability, and scalability of the Ethereum network.  With 0xBTC, the Ethereum network is effectively upgraded with an internal pure-mined and trustless commodity.
